text: Girdhar Bahadur (also Giridhar) was a Mughal Kayasth noble, serving as subahdar of several provinces of the Mughal Empire at various times. He was noted for his military service in Malwa against the Marathas, which led to his death at the Battle of Amjhera. ==References== * * Category:Nawabs of India Category:1728 deaths Category:Subahdars of Awadh Category:Subahdars of Malwa
title: Girdhar Bahadur
